headline: Constellation Energy (CEG) Strikes 20-Year PPA with Meta, Boosts Nuclear Expansion Plans
summary: We recently published 11 Most Profitable Utility Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds.Constellation Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:CEG) is one of these profitable utility stocks. Constellation Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:CEG), a Fortune 200 leader in emissions-free energy, delivers nearly 90% carbon-free power through nuclear, hydro, wind, and solar sources, serving businesses, homes, and public sectors nationwide. headline: UTG: An Excellent Utility Fund For The Long Term, But Too Expensive
summary: UTG offers strong long-term returns and steady income, but appears overvalued after a big rally, limiting upside. Find out why UTG CEF is a hold.
